entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
